title: meet us
toptext: Delicious homemade food for tourists eager for authentic Croatian flavors. Let us charm you with our pleasant atmosphere, cheerful toasts, and sometimes even songs of always relaxed guests who feel at home with us and always return for a reason. We want to share this beauty and peace with you and offer you hospitality in our apartments and restaurant. WELCOME!
textresto: A terrace by the sea, shaded by old olive trees with a beautiful sunset. Delicious homemade food: Pag cheese, lamb, fish, homemade bread
textapp: Close to the sea, without crowds, sounds and scents of nature, the sound of the sea and a beautiful sunset.
